sentences.en: Constitutional changes are exclusively the prerogative of the parliament.
sentences.cn: 修改宪法是议会独有的权力。

sentences.en: David Fincher paints from a palette consisting almost exclusively of grey and mud brown.
sentences.cn: 戴维·芬彻几乎只用灰色和土褐色作画。

sentences.en: He depicts the sordid and vulgar sides of life exclusively.
sentences.cn: 他只描写人生肮脏和庸俗的一面.

sentences.en: He spent the night at the Savoy: like so many of its patrons, he could not resist the exclusively English cooking.
sentences.cn: 他在萨沃伊酒店过了夜：和许多顾客一样，他无法抗拒精美的英式菜肴。

sentences.en: Instruction in these subjects in undergraduate classes is almost exclusively by lecture.
sentences.cn: 本科生的这几门课程几乎完全是通过讲座教授的。

sentences.en: Money was used rarely and in small amounts; it was exclusively Roman.
sentences.cn: 货币很少使用,数量有限, 而且只是罗马钱币.

sentences.en: Mr Marr makes extensive use of exclusively Scottish words.
sentences.cn: 马尔先生使用了大量苏格兰特有的词汇。

sentences.en: Our knowledge about agriculture has so far been exclusively confined to books.
sentences.cn: 我们对农业学的知识至今只限于书本上所说的.

sentences.en: Randolph's work was exclusively concerned with the effects of pollution on health.
sentences.cn: 伦道夫的著作专门论述污染对健康的影响。

sentences.en: That shop caters exclusively to the weaker sex.
sentences.cn: 那家商店专供妇女需要的商品.
典礼上清一色的全是男人.

sentences.en: The club is an exclusively male preserve.
sentences.cn: 该俱乐部只对男性开放.

sentences.en: The proposals before the legislature include the creation of two special courts to deal exclusively with violent crimes.
sentences.cn: 呈交立法机关的提案内容包括成立两个专门审理暴力犯罪的特别法庭。

sentences.en: These are not involved as exclusively as ministers in "soul-work," but they certainly cultivate the inner life more than the third group.
sentences.cn: 他们虽不像牧师那样专门做“灵魂方面的工作”，但是肯定比第三群体更注重于建造人类的生命。

sentences.en: This room is exclusively for women.
Today he was able to focus his message exclusively on the economy.
sentences.cn: 今天他得以将主题全部集中在经济方面。

words.tran_cn: 排除；排斥；驱逐；被排除在外的事物
独家新闻；独家经营的项目；排外者
排除；排斥；拒绝接纳；逐出

trans.tran_cn: 唯一地，专门地，特定地，专有地，排外地
trans.tran_en: to refer to situations or activities that involve only the thing or things mentioned, and nothing else
